00080             function                get_referer()
00081             {
00082                   try
00083                   {
00084                         $URL = '';
00085                         
00086                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'referer' , 'raw' , '' ) != '' )
00087                         {
00088                               $URL = $this->Security->get_gp( 'referer' , 'raw' );
00089                         }
00090                         else
00091                         {
00092                               $URL = $this->Security->get_srv( 'HTTP_REFERER' , 'raw' , false );
00093                         }
00094                         
00095                         return( $URL );
00096                   }
00097                   catch( Exception $e )
00098                   {
00099                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00100                   }
00101             }

00133             function                test_crawler( $CrawlerUrl , $CrawlerName , $Crawler )
00134             {
00135                   try
00136                   {
00137                         $URL = $this->get_referer();
00138                   
00139                         if( $Crawler === false && stristr( $URL , $CrawlerUrl ) )
00140                         {
00141                               $Crawler = $CrawlerName;
00142                         }

00144                         return( $Crawler );

00176             function                get_search_engine()
00177             {
00178                   try
00179                   {
00180                         if( $this->get_referer() === false )
00181                         {
00182                               return( false );
00183                         }
00184                         
00185                         $Crawler = false;
00186                         
00187                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'google.' , 'Google' , $Crawler );
00188                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'yandex.' , 'Yandex' , $Crawler );
00189                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'qip.ru' , 'Qip' , $Crawler );
00190                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'mail.ru' , 'Mail' , $Crawler );
00191                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'rambler.ru' , 'Rambler' , $Crawler );
00192                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'bing.com' , 'Bing' , $Crawler );
00193                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'nigma.ru' , 'Nigma' , $Crawler );
00194                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'webalta.ru' , 'Webalta' , $Crawler );
00195                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'ukr.net' , 'Ukr.net' , $Crawler );
00196                         $Crawler = $this->test_crawler( 'conduit.com' , 'Conduit' , $Crawler );
00197                         
00198                         return( $Crawler );
00199                   }
00200                   catch( Exception $e )
00201                   {
00202                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00224             function                get_search_prefix()
00225             {
00226                   try
00227                   {
00228                         $SearchEngine = $this->get_search_engine();
00229                         
00230                         $Search = false;
00231                         
00232                         switch( $SearchEngine )
00233                         {
00234                               case( 'Google' ):
00235                               case( 'Webalta' ):
00236                               case( 'Mail' ):
00237                               case( 'Bing' ):
00238                               case( 'Conduit' ):
00239                               case( 'Ukr.net' ):$Search = 'q=';break;
00240                               case( 'Yandex' ):$Search = 'text=';break;
00241                               case( 'Qip' ):
00242                               case( 'Rambler' ):$Search = 'query=';break;
00243                               case( 'Nigma' ):$Search = 's=';break;
00244                         }
00245                         
00246                         return( $Search );
00247                   }
00248                   catch( Exception $e )
00249                   {
00250                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00251                   }

00276             function                get_search_query()
00277             {
00278                   try
00279                   {
00280                         $Search = $this->get_search_prefix();
00281                         
00282                         if( $Search !== false )
00283                         {
00284                               $URL = $this->get_referer();
00285                               
00286                               $Phrase = urldecode( urldecode( $URL ) );
00287                               
00288                               preg_match( "/[\?\&]{1}$Search([^\&]*)/" , "$Phrase&" , $Phrase2 );
00289                               
00290                               return( isset( $Phrase2[ 1 ] ) ? $Phrase2[ 1 ] : false );
00291                         }
00292                         else
00293                         {
00294                               return( false );
00295                         }
00296                   }
00297                   catch( Exception $e )
00298                   {
00299                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
